DOC.brief_summary: To assess usefulnes sof misoprostol versus placebo ( double-blind placebo control randomized clinical trial ) facilitate insertion copper-IUD levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system ( LNG-IUS ) case failure due cervical stenosis either nulligravidas parous woman . Additionally evaluate side-effects misoprostol . The hypothesis misoprostol may better placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Use Misoprostol Case Insertion Failure Intrauterine Contraceptives
DOC.detailed_description: Women attend Family Planning clinic University Campinas request insertion copper-IUD LNG-IUS fail attempt due cervical stenosis randomize two group ( 1:1 ) . The study group receive two dos misoprostol ( 200mcg tablet ) vaginal 12 4 hour prior insertion control group receive placebo schedule . The sample 50 woman group . After 24 hour insertion failure woman return clinic new attempt insertion do . At time evaluate insertion able . The data analyzing Ï‡2 test independent sample . After multiple logistic analysis perform evaluate associate variable result ( failure successful ) insertion . The level significance establish P < .005 .
DOC.criteria: Women age > 18 < 50 year old ; Requesting insertion IUD LNGIUS Failure IUD insertion Refuse participate Lost followup return visit
